# AgentSecurity Documentation Index
# Machine-readable documentation index for AI agents
# URL: https://agentsecurity.in/llms.txt

## Overview
> An open standard for defining security boundaries of autonomous AI agents.
> AGENTSECURITY.md is a declarative security policy file that lives in agent project roots.

## Pages
- [Home](https://agentsecurity.in/) — Overview, quickstart, tier selection

- [Integration](https://agentsecurity.in/integration.html) — Model-agnostic integration, framework detection, tamper protection

## Key Concepts
- Security tiers: basic, standard, strict, regulated
- YAML frontmatter + Markdown body format
- Progressive disclosure: metadata at startup, full policy on activation
- Framework auto-detection: LangChain, CrewAI, AutoGen, OpenAI SDK, Anthropic SDK, Vercel AI SDK, and 30+ more
- Agent platform detection: Claude Code, Cursor, GitHub Copilot
- Tamper protection: SHA-256 lock/verify workflow
- Compliance mapping: OWASP LLM Top 10, NIST AI RMF, ISO 42001, EU AI Act

## CLI Commands
- agentsec init — Initialize policy from template (interactive tier selector)
- agentsec validate — Check policy against JSON schema
- agentsec check — Scan codebase for violations (includes framework detection)
- agentsec suggest — Detect frameworks and generate tailored recommendations
- agentsec lock — Generate tamper-protection lock file (SHA-256)
- agentsec verify — Verify policy integrity against lock file
- agentsec report — Generate security scorecard (text/json/badge)
- agentsec read-properties — Extract policy metadata as JSON
- agentsec to-prompt — Generate system prompt XML snippet
